mapper.insert: insert into onlinebookstore.user (Upassword, Uavatar, Unickname, Urealname, Usex, Uaddress, Uphone, Uemail, Ubirthday) VALUES (#{Upassword}, #{Uavatar}, #{Unickname}, #{Urealname}, #{Usex}, #{Uaddress}, #{Uphone}, #{Uemail}, #{Ubirthday})
mapper.update: update onlinebookstore.user set Upassword=#{Upassword}, Uavatar=#{Uavatar}, Unickname=#{Unickname}, Urealname=#{Urealname}, Usex=#{Usex}, Uaddress=#{Uaddress}, Uphone=#{Uphone}, Uemail=#{Uemail}, Ubirthday=#{Ubirthday} where Uid = #{Uid}
